welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Managua, the vibrant and charming capital of Nicaragua! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich culture, delicious cuisine, and beautiful landscapes. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Managua has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Augusto C Sandino Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Augusto C Sandino Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
